article.title: Immigrants Unions & The New Us Labor Mkt
article.text:
ImmigrantsLaborUnions

Immigrants Unions & The New Us Labor Mkt

The black-car industry is organized on the basis of franchises, with most cars \u003cbr\u003e\nowned by drivers, who must maintain the basic standards of the \u003cb\u003ecar service\u003c/b\u003e. The \u003cbr\u003e\napproximately 12,000 employees in the industry are almost exclusively recent ...

By: "Immanuel Ness"
